metadata.title: Doi Potol । দই পটল । Bengali Recipe
metadata.description:
Doi Potol by Monika Bari I রুরাল রেসিপির চতুর্থ পর্ব । পূর্ব বর্ধমানের বননবগ্রামের বাসিন্দা শ্রীমতি মনিকা বারির হাতের রান্না :  দই পটল ।

Pin gourd, a popular summer vegetable, is highly regarded by nutritionists for its abundant vitamins and minerals.  Commonly known as Patal, this versatile vegetable is used to prepare a variety of delicious dishes, including the beloved Dahi Patal.  This gourmet vegetarian dish features special ingredients such as cashew batter, curd, and four melon seeds, offering a delightful culinary experience.

Rural local recipes are integral part of Intangible Cultural Heritage and needs to be preserved and promoted.
